column2: when my tweets change and text has QUOTED_STRING_0 show a random number
column3: ( monitor ( ( @com.twitter.my_tweets ) filter param:text:String =~ QUOTED_STRING_0 ) ) => ( @org.thingpedia.builtin.thingengine.builtin.get_random_between ) => notify

column2: delete the onedrive file that matches PATH_NAME_0 when the newest google drive files are changed with the description containing QUOTED_STRING_0
column3: monitor ( ( @com.google.drive.list_drive_files param:order_by:Enum(created_time_increasing,created_time_decreasing,modified_time_increasing,modified_time_decreasing,name_increasing,name_decreasing) = enum:created_time_decreasing ) filter param:description:String =~ QUOTED_STRING_0 ) => @com.live.onedrive.delete_file param:file_name:Entity(tt:path_name) = PATH_NAME_0
